chara.textHome: Happy New Year! Hee hee...

Today I drew a really good
fortune at the shrine!
Just that put me in such a great mood!

And I prayed for everyone to have
a wonderful year, so I can share
my happiness!

Oh my gosh... My Soul Gem is
shining brighter than I've ever seen!

With this power, we can make this
the best year ever!
I can help people, I'm sure of it now!
Every new year is like a chance to be reborn!
Putting on a kimono is tough work!

This obi is my favorite because it looks cute,
kinda like a ribbon...
But I can't tie it by myself!
I had my first dream of the new year.

I was with Mami, Sayaka, Kyoko,
and Homura... We all ate a
big round cake together.

Cake for New Year's...
That's pretty weird, right?
I was waiting for you! Hee hee...
I wanted to thank you!
You did so much for me this past year!

I'm looking forward to a happy new year
together!
Good morning! *Giggle*
Everyone's going out in kimonos today!
I was so excited I woke up way earlier!
I love the food we have for New Year's!

Not just eating it, but I also like to help
Dad make it with Mom and Tatsuya...
Making it together is so fun!
We're invited to go to Hitomi's house tonight.

If a Witch tries to stop us,
I'll have to take care of it fast!

Oh no! I need to get to sleep
so I can wake up early!

My fortune said
"early to rise, a wish is your prize"!
I saw our teacher in town.

She was muttering "This is why I don't
bother with younger guys"...

Did something happen already,
this early in the year?
*Yawn*

It's winter vacation,
so I want to take it easy...

Wait, no! Magical Girls can't stay
in on New Year's Day!
The Mirror Witch...

Maybe it likes New Year's
mochi in a mirror shape?

I could offer it some in the Labyrinth,
then maybe it'd leave me alone...
but probably not.

This kimono is so cute. I love it, but
it's...honestly kinda hard to walk in.

I have to be careful not to fall
face first into the new year!
I like red bean soup, but mochi is good too...

I'm going to take over the cooking
for Dad tomorrow.
Wanna eat together?

Have you ever seen the
first sunrise of the year?

The light peeks out from the gloom...
It's so magical.
I got all choked up watching it with my family!
I got so many New Year's cards this year!

I also got some from people I didn't write
to though. So I have to reply fast...
*Giggle*

I hope I can play board games with
Tatsuya this year...

We tried to play last year,
but it was too difficult for him.
I should've played badminton.

It's got serves and smashes and volleys...
So similar to hanetsuki!

Celebrating New Year's with everyone is
pretty normal... But it's still a reason
to be happy, isn't it?

Protecting that happiness is an
important part of a Magical Girl's job.

Oh hey, do you want to come
shopping with me?!
The sales started at the stores around here.
They have a New Year's sale every year.
Hee hee hee...

If you keep up the compliments,
I'll never stop blushing!
Maybe I should wear a kimono all year long?!

Ugh, I wanted to go home and
eat New Year's food!

There's some New Year's treats
waiting for me at home!
I have to get home so I can eat some mochi!
Looks like we'll be having a great year!
We all have to get together and celebrate!
My name's Madoka Kaname!
*Giggle*

Homura and I are about to set off
on our New Year's trip to the shrine!
That's why I'm dressed up like this today!

Look! My Soul Gem's shining
even brighter than usual!
Wow... I feel like a whole new person.

Thanks for always being there for me...
Let's always stay close!

One more time - Happy New Year!
Hee hee...

I'm so happy after pulling that
fortune that I just have to keep saying it!
Listen, listen!

My friend invited me over for tea,
and there was a tea stem floating in my cup!

That's a sign of good luck,
you know! It made me so happy!
